import React from 'react'; import { AutoLinkHeader, Example, Link as PatternflyThemeLink } from 'theme-patternfly-org/components'; import srcImportbasic from './html-demos/basic.png'; import srcImportlarge from './html-demos/large.png'; import srcImportmedium from './html-demos/medium.png'; import srcImportmodalwithform from './html-demos/modal-with-form.png'; import srcImportscrollablecontent from './html-demos/scrollable-content.png'; import srcImporttopaligned from './html-demos/top-aligned.png'; const pageData = { "id": "Modal", "section": "components", "source": "html-demos", "slug": "/components/modal/html-demos", "sourceLink": "https://github.com/patternfly/patternfly/blob/main/packages/docs/src/patternfly/demos/Modal/examples/Modal.md", "fullscreenExamples": [ "Basic", "Scrollable content", "Medium", "Large", "Top aligned" ] }; pageData.examples = { 'Basic': props => Page content

This is a long header title that will truncate because modal titles should be very short. Use the modal body to provide more info.

The "aria-describedby" attribute can be applied to any text that adequately describes the modal's purpose. It does not have to be assigned to ".pf-c-modal-box__body"
